headline: ServiceNow (NOW): Reassessing Valuation After Recent Share Price Rebound and Long-Term Gains
summary: ServiceNow (NOW) has quietly outperformed over the past week, even as its share price remains well below this year’s highs. With the stock down sharply year to date, investors are reassessing what the current valuation implies. See our latest analysis for ServiceNow. That recent uptick in the share price, with a 7 day share price return of 3.41% and a still negative year to date share price return of 17.72%, suggests sentiment is stabilising rather than surging. At the same time, the three...
